multiple_choice.question: Who did Opio go hunting with?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: When the day leaves, the night comes
When he came to his village, the villagers were afraid
When the light comes, we can work and when night comes, we can rest

meanings.explain: make an idea clear to someone
